name: Zombie Slaughterhouse
description:
Hey, the game is in a very early stage of production, but we decided to make it available to you so that you and us can follow the progress of work, any bugs, suggestions etc. please report to our email address: kittersdev@gmail.com

In the near future we are going to introduce a multiplayer mode, and many more game mechanics and maps. And also release a full-fledged version of the game for download

Join to our Discord: https://discord.gg/K9JyjdM
